content: I don't have access to the current practices of pedigree. however, it is common for pet food companies to conduct feeding trials to ensure that their products meet the nutritional needs of pets. feeding trials involve feeding the food to animals for a certain period of time and monitoring their health and well-being during that time. the animals are carefully chosen to ensure they represent the intended target population (e.g., puppies, adult dogs, senior dogs, etc.). the feeding trials can provide valuable information on the digestibility, palatability, and overall nutritional adequacy of the food. the results of these trials are crucial in determining the nutritional values of pet food products.
